dependencies.title: Antlr
dependencies.description: ANother Tool for Language Recognition, is a language tool that provides a framework for constructing recognizers, interpreters, compilers, and translators from grammatical descriptions containing actions in a variety of target languages.

dependencies.title: bootstrap
dependencies.description: Sleek, intuitive, and powerful mobile first front-end framework for faster and easier web development.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) in data-target attribute
vulnerabilities.description: The data-target attribute is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting attacks when user-data is supplied to the data-target attribute.

dependencies.title: jQuery
dependencies.description:
jQuery is a new kind of JavaScript Library.
        jQuery is a fast and concise JavaScript Library that simplifies HTML document traversing, event handling, animating, and Ajax interactions for rapid web development. jQuery is designed to change the way that you write JavaScript.
        NOTE: This package is maintained on behalf of the library owners by the NuGet Community Packages project at http://nugetpackages.codeplex.com/

vulnerabilities.title: Cross Site Scripting (XSS)
vulnerabilities.description: Requests to third-party resources with a text/javascript response type are automatically evaluated, which can result in the execution of arbitrary code.

vulnerabilities.title: [Duplicate] Cross Site Scripting (XSS)
vulnerabilities.description:
See https://ossindex.net/resource/vulnerability/8399962417

Requests to third-party resources with a text/javascript response type are automatically evaluated, which can result in the execution of arbitrary code.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) in parseHTML
vulnerabilities.description:
> Scripts passed in event attributes are executed in parseHTML immediately, without any possibility for the user to intervene
> 
> -- [github.com](https://github.com/jquery/jquery/pull/1505)

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.Mvc
dependencies.description: This package contains the runtime assemblies for ASP.NET MVC. ASP.NET MVC gives you a powerful, patterns-based way to build dynamic websites that enables a clean separation of concerns and that gives you full control over markup.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.Razor
dependencies.description: This package contains the runtime assemblies for ASP.NET Web Pages. ASP.NET Web Pages and the new Razor syntax provide a fast, terse, clean and lightweight way to combine server code with HTML to create dynamic web content.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.Web.Optimization
dependencies.description: ASP.NET Optimization introduces a way to bundle and optimize CSS and JavaScript files.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi
dependencies.description: This package contains everything you need to host ASP.NET Web API on IIS. ASP.NET Web API is a framework that makes it easy to build HTTP services that reach a broad range of clients, including browsers and mobile devices. ASP.NET Web API is an ideal platform for building RESTful applications on the .NET Framework.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Client
dependencies.description: This package adds support for formatting and content negotiation to System.Net.Http. It includes support for JSON, XML, and form URL encoded data.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Core
dependencies.description: This package contains the core runtime assemblies for ASP.NET Web API. This package is used by hosts of the ASP.NET Web API runtime. To host a Web API in IIS use the Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.WebHost package. To host a Web API in your own process use the Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.SelfHost package.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.HelpPage
dependencies.description: The ASP.NET Web API Help Page automatically generates help page content for the web APIs on your site. Visitors to your help page can use this content to learn how to call your web APIs. Everything generated by the help page is fully customizable using ASP.NET MVC and Razor. ASP.NET Web API Help Page is a great addition to any ASP.NET Web API project.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Tracing
dependencies.description: Enables ASP.NET Web API tracing using System.Diagnostics.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.WebHost
dependencies.description: This package contains everything you need to host ASP.NET Web API on IIS. ASP.NET Web API is a framework that makes it easy to build HTTP services that reach a broad range of clients, including browsers and mobile devices. ASP.NET Web API is an ideal platform for building RESTful applications on the .NET Framework.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.AspNet.WebPages
dependencies.description: This package contains core runtime assemblies shared between ASP.NET MVC and ASP.NET Web Pages.

dependencies.title: Microsoft.Web.Infrastructure
dependencies.description: This package contains the Microsoft.Web.Infrastructure assembly that lets you dynamically register HTTP modules at run time.

dependencies.title: Modernizr
dependencies.description:
Modernizr adds classes to the <html> element which allow you to target specific browser functionality in your stylesheet. You don't actually need to write any Javascript to use it.
        Modernizr is a small and simple JavaScript library that helps you take advantage of emerging web technologies (CSS3, HTML5) while still maintaining a fine level of control over older browsers that may not yet support these new technologies.
        NOTE: This package is maintained on behalf of the library owners by the NuGet Community Packages project at http://nugetpackages.codeplex.com/

dependencies.title: Newtonsoft.Json
dependencies.description: Json.NET is a popular high-performance JSON framework for .NET

dependencies.title: NuGet.Common
dependencies.description: NuGet client library.

dependencies.title: NuGet.Frameworks
dependencies.description: The understanding of target frameworks for NuGet.Packaging

dependencies.title: NuGet.Packaging
dependencies.description: NuGet's implementation for reading nupkg package and nuspec package specification files.

dependencies.title: NuGet.Packaging.Core
dependencies.description: The core data structures for NuGet.Packaging

dependencies.title: NuGet.Versioning
dependencies.description: NuGet's implementation of Semantic Versioning.

dependencies.title: Respond
dependencies.description: The goal of this script is to provide a fast and lightweight (3kb minified / 1kb gzipped) script to enable responsive web designs in browsers that don't support CSS3 Media Queries - in particular, Internet Explorer 8 and under. It's written in such a way that it will probably patch support for other non-supporting browsers as well (more information on that soon).

dependencies.title: WebGrease
dependencies.description: Web Grease is a suite of tools for optimizing javascript, css files and images.
